content:
I've just come across https://arxivdiff.org/, which I imagine others will also find very useful! (There's an announcement here.)

I built a tool with @Serezha to show diffs between any two revisions of a paper on #arXiv. Just take any arXiv URL and replace http://arxiv.org with http://arxivdiff.org and you'll get output like the image below. https://twitter.com/snrrrub/status/1389609857678864388/photo/1

- Sharvil Nanavati (@snrrrub)
